statements: SELECT * FROM fair_trade_supply_chain;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, country_of_origin FROM fair_trade_supply_chain;
SELECT id, product_name FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE fair_trade_certification = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE country_of_origin = 'Mexico';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM fair_trade_supply_chain ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE country_of_origin = 'Brazil';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE fair_trade_certification = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, country_of_origin FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE fair_trade_certification = FALSE ORDER BY country_of_origin DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, country_of_origin FROM fair_trade_supply_chain WHERE id > 10 AND fair_trade_certification = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM fair_trade_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, rating FROM fair_trade_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE certification_status = FALSE ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM fair_trade_products WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_products JOIN suppliers ON fair_trade_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM fair_trade_products;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, location FROM fair_trade_products INNER JOIN suppliers ON fair_trade_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM fair_trade_products JOIN suppliers ON fair_trade_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM FairTrade_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM FairTrade_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, fair_trade_certified FROM Suppliers WHERE fair_trade_certified = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FairTrade_Companies
SELECT company_name, location FROM FairTrade_Companies WHERE location = 'Europe'
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, fair_trade_certified FROM Suppliers WHERE fair_trade_certified = TRUE
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM Products INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_practices;
SELECT supplier_name, certification_status FROM fair_trade_practices WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, product_name, certification_date FROM fair_trade_practices WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information;
SELECT agency_name, certification_type FROM certification_agencies;
SELECT * FROM fair_trade_practices;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM fair_trade_practices WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT certification_date, supplier_name, product_name FROM fair_trade_practices WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT f.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM fair_trade_practices f JOIN supplier_information s ON f.supplier_name = s.supplier_name;
SELECT c.category_name, p.product_name, p.certification_status FROM product_categories c JOIN fair_trade_practices p ON c.category_id = p.id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM producers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.name AS ProductName, s.name AS SupplierName FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE producer_id IN (SELECT id FROM producers WHERE certification_status = true);
SELECT p.name, sup.name AS supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers sup ON p.id = sup.product_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.certification_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN certifications c ON p.producer_id = c.producer_id;

SELECT t.transaction_date, p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.id JOIN suppliers s ON p.id = s.product_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
